resources.string: Match the definition and the word.
Find the meaning of this root word. Hint: It is in blue
Break it down, identify all of the roots that belong in this word.
Find the roots that make up this word. Hint: Use the definition
Match a word to its definition, then select the definition of the highlighted root.
Match the word to its definition, then select all of its roots, and finally select the definition for each root.
Fill in the blanks using roots from the choices below to form a word whose definition matches the one above.
Select and define all of the roots for the given word, and then match the word to its definition. Complete each part in less than 14 seconds.
Select all roots for the given word in 9 seconds.
Define each given root in 9 seconds.
Select all roots for the given definition in 9 seconds.
Match the word to its definition in 9 seconds.
Would you like to post your score to Facebook?
You must complete at least one level completely to review your scores
